author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Leidos Awarded Contract By U.S. Army Contracting Command - Orlando
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Leidos Holdings Inc:
* LEIDOS - AWARDED CONTRACT BY U.S. ARMY CONTRACTING COMMAND - ORLANDO
* LEIDOS HOLDINGS - CONTRACT HAS 1-YEAR BASE PERIOD OF PERFORMANCE WITH FOUR ONE-YEAR OPTIONS & TOTAL CONTRACT VALUE OF $210 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
